import React, { Fragment, useState } from 'react'; import {Link, withRouter} from 'react-router-dom' import PropTypes from 'prop-types'; import { connect } from 'react-redux'; import { createProfile } from '../../actions/profile'; const CreateProfile = props => { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ company: '', website: '', location: '', bio: '', status: '', githubusername: '', skills: '', youtube: '', facebook: '', twitter: '', instagram: '', linkedin: '', }); const [displaySocialInputs, toggleSocialInputs] = useState(false); const { company, website, location, bio, status, githubusername, skills, youtube, facebook, twitter, instagram, linkedin, } = formData; const onChange = e => setFormData({...formData, [e.target.name]: e.target.value}) return (

Create Your Profile

Let's get some information to make your profile stand out

* = required field
Give us an idea of where you are at in your career
onChange(e)}/> Could be your own company or one you work for
onChange(e)}/> Could be your own or a company website
onChange(e)}/> City & state suggested (eg. Boston, MA)
onChange(e)}/> Please use comma separated values (eg. HTML,CSS,JavaScript,PHP)
onChange(e)} /> If you want your latest repos and a Github link, include your username
Tell us a little about yourself
Optional
{displaySocialInputs && (
onChange(e)}/>
onChange(e)}/>
onChange(e)}/>
onChange(e)}/>
onChange(e)}/>
)} Go Back
); }; CreateProfile.propTypes = {}; Dashboard.propTypes = { getCurrentProfile: PropTypes.func.isRequired, auth: PropTypes.object.isRequired, profile: PropTypes.object.isRequired, }; const mapStateToProps = state => ({ auth: state.auth, profile: state.profile, }); export default connect(mapStateToProps, {createProfile})(CreateProfile);
